attributes.action: recognise the changed economic conditions and to call a moratorium on the closure of HMRC Office Closures and job losses in Scotland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In line with the call from the Scottish HMRC Offices Under Threat Campaign ("SHOUT!"), we recognise that the proposed closure of Individual and clustered HMRC Offices must now be stopped.

Whilst of the opinion that the closures were in any case a false economy, SHOUT believes that in the current economic climate the closure of offices and centralisation of work will have a detrimental effect on local economies in Scotland that already stand to suffer majorly during the recession.
